Abazm was a cultural guide and commercial liaison who operated throughout the Dragon Coast during the midâ€“14 century DR.
He had greasy hair and dressed in a striped cloak.
Abazm did not offer up great first impressions, often appearing as shifty and untrustworthy, despite his attempted displays of charm and self-importance.
Despite his personal shortcomings, Abazm was skilled as a social and commercial middleman.
While Abazm had an ongoing working relationship with the Shou royals of the Ginger Palace, he publicly ran afoul of Princess Wei Dao by bringing to her a merchant that sold pearl dust that caused her develop a nasty rash. This was just a superficial gaffe however, as he actually served as Wei Daos secret messenger, bringing her information for her spies outside the palace.
In the , Abazm managed to secure a meeting the novice Harpers agent Ruha, her ally Fowler who posed as her Bedine bodyguard, and the Shou royals of the Ginger Palace.
